sys_ui_message.message:
Instructions:

  1. Fill in the Date field and Save the record. The system automatically retrieves the text from Wikipedia and parses it in to the related lists below.
  2. Review the Events and Birthdays related lists. Check the records you want to include in the output. Use the list menu option Show on output to change the Output field of each record to true. This indicates the selected records are part of the generated output text.
  3. When done reviewing, click the Generate Output button.
  4. Review the output text. Make any final touch-ups and Save.
  5. Click the Publish button to create a recurring annual Google Calendar event.
